briefdescription.para: Returns whether chat messages grouping is enabled or not.

briefdescription.para: Sets whether chat messages grouping is enabled or not.

detaileddescription.para:
Set [sip] chat_messages_aggregation in your configuration file for the timer, default is 500ms.
core
The LinphoneCore object
enabled
TRUE to wait for chat messages and notify them as at once, FALSE to keep legacy behavior.

briefdescription.para: LDAP Server.

detaileddescription.para: eg: ldap:/// for a localhost server or ldap://ldap.example.org/ Default value: "ldap:///". This field is required.
You must use 'ldap' scheme. 'ldaps' for LDAP over SSL is non-standardized and deprecated.

briefdescription.para: Get the LDAP Server.

simplesect.para: LDAP Server address.

briefdescription.para: Bind DN to use for bindings.

detaileddescription.para: The bindDN DN is the credential that is used to authenticate against an LDAP. If empty, the connection will be Anonymous. eg: cn=ausername,ou=people,dc=bc,dc=com Default value : "".

parameterdescription.para: The Bind DN to use for bindings.

briefdescription.para: Get the Bind DN to use for bindings.

detaileddescription.para: The bindDN DN is the credential that is used to authenticate against an LDAP. If empty, the connection will be Anonymous. eg: cn=ausername,ou=people,dc=bc,dc=com

simplesect.para: The Bind DN to use for bindings.

briefdescription.para: BaseObject is a specification for LDAP Search Scopes that specifies that the Search Request should only be performed against the entry specified as the search base DN.

detaileddescription.para: No entries above it will be considered. This field is required. Default value : "dc=example,dc=com"

briefdescription.para: Get the BaseObject.

detaileddescription.para: It is a specification for LDAP Search Scopes that specifies that the Search Request should only be performed against the entry specified as the search base DN. No entries above it will be considered. This field is required.

simplesect.para: The specification.

briefdescription.para: Timeout for requests in seconds.

detaileddescription.para: It limits the time for searchs and the value is passed to Ldap with LDAP_OPT_NETWORK_TIMEOUT. Default value : 5.

briefdescription.para: Get the timeout for requests in seconds.

simplesect.para: The timeout in seconds.

briefdescription.para: Timeout for TLS connection in milliseconds.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : 1000.

briefdescription.para: Get the timeout for TLS connection in milliseconds.

simplesect.para: The timeout in milliseconds.

briefdescription.para: The max results when requesting searches.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : 5. This value fit for standard cases where only first results are needed. Also, it avoids latency on each searchs.

parameterdescription.para: The max results when requesting searches.

briefdescription.para: Get the max results when requesting searches.

simplesect.para: The max results when requesting searches.

briefdescription.para: The minimum characters needed for doing a search on LDAP servers.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : 0.

parameterdescription.para: The minimum characters needed by a search.

briefdescription.para: Get the minimum characters needed for doing a search on LDAP servers.

simplesect.para: The minimum characters needed by a search.

briefdescription.para: Delay between each search in milliseconds Default value : 500.
Get the delay between each search in milliseconds.

simplesect.para: The delay in milliseconds.

briefdescription.para: Get the authentification method.

briefdescription.para: The password to pass to server when binding.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : "".

parameterdescription.para: The password to pass to server when binding.

briefdescription.para: Get the password to pass to server when binding.

simplesect.para: The password to pass to server when binding.

briefdescription.para: The search is based on this filter to search contacts.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : "(sn=*%s*)".

briefdescription.para: Get the search is based on this filter to search contacts.

simplesect.para: The filter to use.

briefdescription.para: Check these attributes to build Name Friend, separated by a comma and the first is the highest priority.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : "sn".

parameterdescription.para: The comma separated attributes for the search.

briefdescription.para: Get the attributes to build Name Friend, separated by a comma and the first is the highest priority.

simplesect.para: The comma separated attributes for the search.

briefdescription.para: Check these attributes to build the SIP username in address of Friend.

detaileddescription.para: Attributes are separated by a comma. Default value : "mobile,telephoneNumber,homePhone,sn".

parameterdescription.para: The comma separated attributes for building Friend.

detaileddescription.para: Attributes are separated by a comma.

briefdescription.para: Add the domain to the sip address(sip:username@domain).

detaileddescription.para: By default or if it is empty, the domain will be specify while searching on the current proxy account. Default value : "".

parameterdescription.para: The SIP domain for the friend.

briefdescription.para: Get the domain to the sip address(sip:username@domain).

simplesect.para: The SIP domain for the friend.

briefdescription.para: If this config is enabled.

detaileddescription.para: Default value : FALSE.

parameterdescription.para: Enable or not the LDAP configuration.

briefdescription.para: Return if the configuration is enabled.

simplesect.para: Enable or not the LDAP configuration.

briefdescription.para: The dns resolution is done by Linphone using Sal.

detaileddescription.para: It will pass an IP to LDAP. By doing that, the TLS negociation could not check the hostname. You may deactivate the verifications if wanted to force the connection. Default value : FALSE.

parameterdescription.para: Enable or not the use of sal.

briefdescription.para: Return if the dns resolution is done by Linphone using Sal.

detaileddescription.para: It will pass an IP to LDAP. By doing that, the TLS negociation could not check the hostname. You may deactivate the verifications if wanted to force the connection.

simplesect.para: Enable or not the use of sal.

briefdescription.para: Encrypt transactions by LDAP over TLS(StartTLS).

detaileddescription.para: You must use 'ldap' scheme. 'ldaps' for LDAP over SSL is non-standardized and deprecated. StartTLS in an extension to the LDAP protocol which uses the TLS protocol to encrypt communication. It works by establishing a normal - i.e. unsecured - connection with the LDAP server before a handshake negotiation between the server and the web services is carried out. Here, the server sends its certificate to prove its identity before the secure connection is established. Default value : TRUE.

parameterdescription.para: Enable or not the use of TLS.

briefdescription.para: Return if transactions are encrypted by LDAP over TLS(StartTLS).

detaileddescription.para: You must use \'ldap\' scheme. \'ldaps\' for LDAP over SSL is non-standardized and deprecated. StartTLS in an extension to the LDAP protocol which uses the TLS protocol to encrypt communication. It works by establishing a normal - i.e. unsecured - connection with the LDAP server before a handshake negotiation between the server and the web services is carried out. Here, the server sends its certificate to prove its identity before the secure connection is established.

simplesect.para: Enable or not the use of TLS.

briefdescription.para: The debug verbosity level from internal LDAP API.

detaileddescription.para: Values are LinphoneLdapDebugLevel Default value: LinphoneLdapDebugLevelOff

briefdescription.para: Return the debug verbosity level.

simplesect.para: The LinphoneLdapDebugLevel debug level.

briefdescription.para: Specify whether the tls server certificate must be verified when connecting to a LDAP server.

detaileddescription.para: Values are LinphoneLdapCertVerificationMode Default value : LinphoneLdapCertVerificationDefault (auto)

parameterdescription.para: The TLS verification mode from LinphoneLdapCertVerificationMode

briefdescription.para: Return whether the tls server certificate must be verified when connecting to a LDAP server.

simplesect.para: The TLS verification mode from LinphoneLdapCertVerificationMode

simplesect.para: The LinphoneLdapCheck values. LinphoneLdapCheckOk if everything is ok.
